

# How does it work? 

[Biodiversity Observations Miner](https://github.com/fgabriel1891/BiodiversityObservationsMiner) makes use of R packages designed for text mining and base R functions. The `taxize` package is used to establish the API connection to the [Global Names Recognition and Discovery (GNRF)](rdrr.io) 

## Required R packages

- shiny
- shinythemes
- shinydashboard
- stringi
- stringr
- taxize
- tidyverse
- tidytext
- tibble
- widyr
- fulltext
- tm
- DT
